Title: A Functional Favor
Description:
I am seeking my mentor, Foreman Arbauch. He is... missing. Under other circumstances, I would send for a search party from Gundargaz, but there is no time.

I suspect he passed through here, but the only lead I have is DelGizmo. He wants the local fog beasts removed. Reluctance. But if he has seen Arbauch, I must learn what he knows.

The Lurkers to the south carry powerful Galvanic Glands. They have enough charge to disperse even the thickest fog. Retrieve some. Compensation assured.
CompletionText: Haste is appreciated. I must find Arbauch.
RewardText: Approval. These seem quite energetic. They will allow you to scare off the fog beasts for DelGizmo.
